verses.verse: וַיִּסַּ֨ע <S%H5265><s%> journeyed מִשָּׁ֤ם <S%H8033><s%> there אַבְרָהָם֙ <S%H85><s%> And Abraham אַ֣רְצָה <S%H776><s%> country הַנֶּ֔גֶב <S%H5045><s%> from thence toward the south וַיֵּ֥שֶׁב <S%H3427><s%> and dwelled בֵּין־ <S%H996><s%> between קָדֵ֖שׁ <S%H6946><s%> between Kadesh וּבֵ֣ין <S%H996><s%> between שׁ֑וּר <S%H7793><s%> and Shur וַיָּ֖גָר <S%H1481><s%> and sojourned בִּגְרָֽר׃ <S%H1642><s%> in Gerar

וַיֹּ֧אמֶר <S%H559><s%> said אַבְרָהָ֛ם <S%H85><s%> And Abraham אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> of שָׂרָ֥ה <S%H8283><s%> Sarah אִשְׁתּ֖וֹ <S%H802><s%> his wife אֲחֹ֣תִי <S%H269><s%> She [is] my sister הִ֑וא <S%H1931><s%> he וַיִּשְׁלַ֗ח <S%H7971><s%> sent אֲבִימֶ֙לֶךְ֙ <S%H40><s%> and Abimelech מֶ֣לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> king גְּרָ֔ר <S%H1642><s%> of Gerar וַיִּקַּ֖ח <S%H3947><s%> and took אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> שָׂרָֽה׃ <S%H8283><s%> Sarah

וַיָּבֹ֧א <S%H935><s%> came אֱלֹהִ֛ים <S%H430><s%> But God אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to אֲבִימֶ֖לֶךְ <S%H40><s%> to Abimelech בַּחֲל֣וֹם <S%H2472><s%> in a dream הַלָּ֑יְלָה <S%H3915><s%> by night וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <S%H559><s%> and said ל֗וֹ הִנְּךָ֥ <S%H2009><s%> Behold מֵת֙ <S%H4191><s%> to him Behold thou [art but] a dead man עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> because הָאִשָּׁ֣ה <S%H802><s%> for the woman אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> whom לָקַ֔חְתָּ <S%H3947><s%> which thou hast taken וְהִ֖וא <S%H1931><s%> he בְּעֻ֥לַת <S%H1166><s%> wife בָּֽעַל׃ <S%H1167><s%> for she [is] a man's

וַאֲבִימֶ֕לֶךְ <S%H40><s%> But Abimelech לֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> had not קָרַ֖ב <S%H7126><s%> had not come near אֵלֶ֑יהָ <S%H413><s%> about וַיֹּאמַ֕ר <S%H559><s%> her and he said אֲדֹנָ֕י <S%H136><s%> Lord הֲג֥וֹי <S%H1471><s%> A nation גַּם־ <S%H1571><s%> even צַדִּ֖יק <S%H6662><s%> also a righteous תַּהֲרֹֽג׃ <S%H2026><s%> wilt thou slay

הֲלֹ֨א <S%H3808><s%> not ה֤וּא <S%H1931><s%> he not unto me She אָֽמַר־ <S%H559><s%> Said לִי֙ אֲחֹ֣תִי <S%H269><s%> not הִ֔וא <S%H1931><s%> she וְהִֽיא־ <S%H1931><s%> himself גַם־ <S%H1571><s%> even הִ֥וא <S%H1931><s%> himself אָֽמְרָ֖ה <S%H559><s%> herself said אָחִ֣י <S%H251><s%> He [is] my brother ה֑וּא <S%H1931><s%> himself בְּתָם־ <S%H8537><s%> in the integrity לְבָבִ֛י <S%H3824><s%> of my heart וּבְנִקְיֹ֥ן <S%H5356><s%> and innocency כַּפַּ֖י <S%H3709><s%> of my hands עָשִׂ֥יתִי <S%H6213><s%> have I done זֹֽאת׃ <S%H2063><s%> likewise

וַיֹּאמֶר֩ <S%H559><s%> said אֵלָ֨יו <S%H413><s%> then הָֽאֱלֹהִ֜ים <S%H430><s%> And God בַּחֲלֹ֗ם <S%H2472><s%> unto him in a dream גַּ֣ם <S%H1571><s%> Yea אָנֹכִ֤י <S%H595><s%> I יָדַ֙עְתִּי֙ <S%H3045><s%> I know כִּ֤י <S%H3588><s%> in בְתָם־ <S%H8537><s%> this in the integrity לְבָבְךָ֙ <S%H3824><s%> of thy heart עָשִׂ֣יתָ <S%H6213><s%> that thou didst זֹּ֔את <S%H2063><s%> likewise וָאֶחְשֹׂ֧ךְ <S%H2820><s%> for I also withheld גַּם־ <S%H1571><s%> also אָנֹכִ֛י <S%H595><s%> I אֽוֹתְךָ֖ <S%H853><s%> מֵחֲטוֹ־ <S%H2398><s%> thee from sinning לִ֑י עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> and כֵּ֥ן <S%H3651><s%> after that לֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> did not נְתַתִּ֖יךָ <S%H5414><s%> against me therefore suffered לִנְגֹּ֥עַ <S%H5060><s%> I thee not to touch אֵלֶֽיהָ׃ <S%H413><s%> about

וְעַתָּ֗ה <S%H6258><s%> Now הָשֵׁ֤ב <S%H7725><s%> Now therefore restore אֵֽשֶׁת־ <S%H802><s%> [his] wife הָאִישׁ֙ <S%H376><s%> the man כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> is a נָבִ֣יא <S%H5030><s%> for he [is] a prophet ה֔וּא <S%H1931><s%> and he וְיִתְפַּלֵּ֥ל <S%H6419><s%> and he shall pray בַּֽעַדְךָ֖ <S%H1157><s%> for thee וֶֽחְיֵ֑ה <S%H2421><s%> and thou shalt live וְאִם־ <S%H518><s%> if אֵֽינְךָ֣ <S%H369><s%> not מֵשִׁ֗יב <S%H7725><s%> and if thou restore דַּ֚ע <S%H3045><s%> [her] not know כִּי־ <S%H3588><s%> that מ֣וֹת <S%H4191><s%> thou that thou shalt surely תָּמ֔וּת <S%H4191><s%> die אַתָּ֖ה <S%H859><s%> you וְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> and all אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> who לָֽךְ׃

וַיַּשְׁכֵּ֨ם <S%H7925><s%> rose early אֲבִימֶ֜לֶךְ <S%H40><s%> Therefore Abimelech בַּבֹּ֗קֶר <S%H1242><s%> in the morning וַיִּקְרָא֙ <S%H7121><s%> and called לְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> all עֲבָדָ֔יו <S%H5650><s%> all his servants וַיְדַבֵּ֛ר <S%H1696><s%> and told אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all הַדְּבָרִ֥ים <S%H1697><s%> all these things הָאֵ֖לֶּה <S%H428><s%> these בְּאָזְנֵיהֶ֑ם <S%H241><s%> in their ears וַיִּֽירְא֥וּ <S%H3372><s%> afraid הָאֲנָשִׁ֖ים <S%H376><s%> and the men מְאֹֽד׃ <S%H3966><s%> were sore

וַיִּקְרָ֨א <S%H7121><s%> called אֲבִימֶ֜לֶךְ <S%H40><s%> Then Abimelech לְאַבְרָהָ֗ם <S%H85><s%> Abraham וַיֹּ֨אמֶר <S%H559><s%> and said ל֜וֹ מֶֽה־ <S%H4100><s%> What עָשִׂ֤יתָ <S%H6213><s%> unto him What hast thou done לָּ֙נוּ֙ וּמֶֽה־ <S%H4100><s%> and how חָטָ֣אתִי <S%H2398><s%> unto us? and what have I offended לָ֔ךְ כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> that הֵבֵ֧אתָ <S%H935><s%> thee that thou hast brought עָלַ֛י <S%H5921><s%> and וְעַל־ <S%H5921><s%> on מַמְלַכְתִּ֖י <S%H4467><s%> on me and on my kingdom חֲטָאָ֣ה <S%H2401><s%> sin גְדֹלָ֑ה <S%H1419><s%> a great מַעֲשִׂים֙ <S%H4639><s%> deeds אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> after לֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> not יֵֽעָשׂ֔וּ <S%H6213><s%> unto me that ought not to be done עָשִׂ֖יתָ <S%H6213><s%> to be done עִמָּדִֽי׃ <S%H5978><s%> against

וַיֹּ֥אמֶר <S%H559><s%> said אֲבִימֶ֖לֶךְ <S%H40><s%> And Abimelech אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to אַבְרָהָ֑ם <S%H85><s%> unto Abraham מָ֣ה <S%H4100><s%> What רָאִ֔יתָ <S%H7200><s%> sawest thou כִּ֥י <S%H3588><s%> that עָשִׂ֖יתָ <S%H6213><s%> that thou hast done אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַדָּבָ֥ר <S%H1697><s%> act הַזֶּֽה׃ <S%H2088><s%> this

וַיֹּ֙אמֶר֙ <S%H559><s%> said אַבְרָהָ֔ם <S%H85><s%> And Abraham כִּ֣י <S%H3588><s%> Because אָמַ֗רְתִּי <S%H559><s%> Because I thought רַ֚ק <S%H7535><s%> Surely אֵין־ <S%H369><s%> there יִרְאַ֣ת <S%H3374><s%> the fear אֱלֹהִ֔ים <S%H430><s%> of God בַּמָּק֖וֹם <S%H4725><s%> [is] not in this place הַזֶּ֑ה <S%H2088><s%> this וַהֲרָג֖וּנִי <S%H2026><s%> and they will slay me עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> and דְּבַ֥ר <S%H1697><s%> sake אִשְׁתִּֽי׃ <S%H802><s%> for my wife's

וְגַם־ <S%H1571><s%> Besides אָמְנָ֗ה <S%H546><s%> And yet indeed אֲחֹתִ֤י <S%H269><s%> [she is] my sister בַת־ <S%H1323><s%> she [is] the daughter אָבִי֙ <S%H1><s%> of my father הִ֔וא <S%H1931><s%> he אַ֖ךְ <S%H389><s%> also לֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> not בַת־ <S%H1323><s%> but not the daughter אִמִּ֑י <S%H517><s%> of my mother וַתְּהִי־ <S%H1961><s%> became לִ֖י לְאִשָּֽׁה׃ <S%H802><s%> and she became my wife

וַיְהִ֞י <S%H1961><s%> came כַּאֲשֶׁ֧ר <S%H834><s%> which הִתְע֣וּ <S%H8582><s%> caused me to wander אֹתִ֗י <S%H853><s%> אֱלֹהִים֮ <S%H430><s%> And it came to pass when God מִבֵּ֣ית <S%H1004><s%> house אָבִי֒ <S%H1><s%> from my father's וָאֹמַ֣ר <S%H559><s%> that I said לָ֔הּ זֶ֣ה <S%H2088><s%> to her This חַסְדֵּ֔ךְ <S%H2617><s%> unto her This [is] thy kindness אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> which תַּעֲשִׂ֖י <S%H6213><s%> which thou shalt shew עִמָּדִ֑י <S%H5978><s%> against אֶ֤ל <S%H413><s%> about כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> every הַמָּקוֹם֙ <S%H4725><s%> unto me at every place אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> which נָב֣וֹא <S%H935><s%> whither we shall come שָׁ֔מָּה <S%H8033><s%> in it אִמְרִי־ <S%H559><s%> say לִ֖י אָחִ֥י <S%H251><s%> of me He [is] my brother הֽוּא׃ <S%H1931><s%> he

וַיִּקַּ֨ח <S%H3947><s%> took אֲבִימֶ֜לֶךְ <S%H40><s%> And Abimelech צֹ֣אן <S%H6629><s%> sheep וּבָקָ֗ר <S%H1241><s%> and oxen וַעֲבָדִים֙ <S%H5650><s%> and menservants וּשְׁפָחֹ֔ת <S%H8198><s%> and womenservants וַיִּתֵּ֖ן <S%H5414><s%> and gave לְאַבְרָהָ֑ם <S%H85><s%> [them] unto Abraham וַיָּ֣שֶׁב <S%H7725><s%> and restored ל֔וֹ אֵ֖ת <S%H853><s%> שָׂרָ֥ה <S%H8283><s%> him Sarah אִשְׁתּֽוֹ׃ <S%H802><s%> his wife

וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <S%H559><s%> said אֲבִימֶ֔לֶךְ <S%H40><s%> And Abimelech הִנֵּ֥ה <S%H2009><s%> Behold אַרְצִ֖י <S%H776><s%> Behold my land לְפָנֶ֑יךָ <S%H6440><s%> [is] before thee בַּטּ֥וֹב <S%H2896><s%> good בְּעֵינֶ֖יךָ <S%H5869><s%> affliction שֵֽׁב׃ <S%H3427><s%> dwell

וּלְשָׂרָ֣ה <S%H8283><s%> And unto Sarah אָמַ֗ר <S%H559><s%> he said הִנֵּ֨ה <S%H2009><s%> Behold נָתַ֜תִּי <S%H5414><s%> Behold I have given אֶ֤לֶף <S%H505><s%> a thousand כֶּ֙סֶף֙ <S%H3701><s%> [pieces] of silver לְאָחִ֔יךְ <S%H251><s%> thy brother הִנֵּ֤ה <S%H2009><s%> behold הוּא־ <S%H1931><s%> he לָךְ֙ כְּס֣וּת <S%H3682><s%> behold he [is] to thee a covering עֵינַ֔יִם <S%H5869><s%> of the eyes לְכֹ֖ל <S%H3605><s%> all אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> who אִתָּ֑ךְ <S%H854><s%> and before וְאֵ֥ת <S%H854><s%> and before כֹּ֖ל <S%H3605><s%> all וְנֹכָֽחַת׃ <S%H3198><s%> unto all that [are] with thee and with all [other] thus she was reproved

וַיִּתְפַּלֵּ֥ל <S%H6419><s%> prayed אַבְרָהָ֖ם <S%H85><s%> So Abraham אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to הָאֱלֹהִ֑ים <S%H430><s%> unto God וַיִּרְפָּ֨א <S%H7495><s%> healed אֱלֹהִ֜ים <S%H430><s%> and God אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> אֲבִימֶ֧לֶךְ <S%H40><s%> Abimelech וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> אִשְׁתּ֛וֹ <S%H802><s%> and his wife וְאַמְהֹתָ֖יו <S%H519><s%> and his maidservants וַיֵּלֵֽדוּ׃ <S%H3205><s%> and they bare

כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> for עָצֹ֤ר <S%H6113><s%> had fast עָצַר֙ <S%H6113><s%> closed up יְהוָ֔ה <S%H3068><s%> For the LORD בְּעַ֥ד <S%H1157><s%> about כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all רֶ֖חֶם <S%H7358><s%> all the wombs לְבֵ֣ית <S%H1004><s%> of the house אֲבִימֶ֑לֶךְ <S%H40><s%> of Abimelech עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> and דְּבַ֥ר <S%H1697><s%> because שָׂרָ֖ה <S%H8283><s%> of Sarah אֵ֥שֶׁת <S%H802><s%> wife אַבְרָהָֽם׃ <S%H85><s%> Abraham's ס
